title: Stand Inside Your Love
brief_description: “Stand Inside Your Love” is a song by American alternative rock band the Smashing Pumpkins. The music video of “Stand Inside Your Love” is a tribute to the play Salomé by Oscar Wilde.

constellations_other.name: Using the silent film aesthetic
constellations_other.description: Explore how contemporary filmmakers use visual references to the silent era to convey information to a film literate audience.

description: “Stand Inside Your Love” is a song by American alternative rock band the Smashing Pumpkins. The music video of “Stand Inside Your Love” is a tribute to the play Salomé by Oscar Wilde. Billy Corgan created the video’s look together with English director W.I.Z. under the heavy influence of original Salomé illustrations by Aubrey Beardsley.
description_for_label: “Stand Inside Your Love” is a song by American alternative rock band the Smashing Pumpkins. The music video of “Stand Inside Your Love” is a tribute to the play Salomé by Oscar Wilde. Billy Corgan created the video’s look together with English director W.I.Z. under the heavy influence of original Salomé illustrations by Aubrey Beardsley.
